SubjectRegulations Amending the Letter Mail Regulations
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE LETTER MAIL REGULATIONS, which set domestic letter mail rates, other than the domestic basic letter rate, effective January 17, 2011. Canadaâ€™s domestic letter rates will continue to compare favourably with those of other industrialized countries.
